title: 20 Minute Queue Ban
body: I just 'played' a game as Jinx ad carry. At about 5 minutes in, I was told that the client had disconnected due to having no internet access. This, however, was not the case - I had full internet access. I decided it wasn't very major and that I would take the loss as my support afk'd after my disconnection. I reconnected at the 10 minute mark and played the game right through until our nexus was destroyed. At the end of the game I was slapped with five 20 minute queue bans for afking, I must stress that this was a FIVE minute client failure. How is this fair?

replies.body: This is bullshit i got the low priority queue EVEN THO I REJOINED THE GAME WTF RITO FIX YOUR GOD DAMN PUNISHMENT SYSTEM

Not-so-fun Fact: The threshold for taking no action in which someone is considered to be "afk" is five minutes. It's bull and I wish they'd change it.

But even so, Leavebuster won't apply penalties to someone who only left one game.

( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
